  • Food Ingredients for Healh & Nutrition

    From dietary fiber to low sodium applications, consider our food ingredient solutions

  • High Quality Alcohol Products

    Make yours a world-class pour - let us help take your formulations to the next level.

  • Partnering with Our Customers

    We are dedicated to creating better products for consumers

MGP provides a host of naturally derived specialty ingredients that have been developed for use primarily in food, beverage and household product applications. From developing new product innovations to enhancing the qualities of our unique proteins and starches and premium alcohol products, we create solutions that help our customers succeed.

Ask the Experts

If you are in the process of developing a new product innovation or improving an existing product formulation, our science and process experts are equipped to assist you and address any questions you may have about products, applications or services.
